dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, so I saw some interesting news coming out of Kazakhstan. Looks like they might be getting a new national holiday, potentially even a day off!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, so I saw some interesting news coming out of Kazakhstan. Looks like they might be getting a new national holiday, potentially even a day off!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A new national holiday and day off may be introduced in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? Uh, which one? You know, we're always up for more holidays.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? Uh, which one? You know, we're always up for more holidays.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Right? So, it's actually June 1st, International Children's Day. A deputy named Kenzhegul Seitzhan proposed it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? So, it's actually June first, International Children's Day. A deputy named Kenzhegul Seitzhan proposed it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Majilis deputy Kenzhegul Seitzhan proposed granting June 1 " International Children's Day the status of a national holiday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's actually, um, a pretty nice idea. What was the, like, reasoning behind it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's actually, um, a pretty nice idea. What was the, like, reasoning behind it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Seitzhan really emphasized that children are a "strategic resource" and the "foundation of the country's future." Basically, making sure kids are safe and well-developed should be a top priority.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Seitzhan really emphasized that children are a strategic resource and the foundation of the country's future. Basically, making sure kids are safe and well-developed should be a top priority.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Children are a strategic resource and the foundation of the country's future. Creating conditions for their safe, healthy, and well-rounded development must be a key priority of state policy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that, that totally makes sense. You know, strengthening family bonds and all that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that, that totally makes sense. You know, strengthening family bonds and all that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But, um, that wasn't the only thing the deputy proposed. They also suggested new rules for holiday transfers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But, um, that wasn't the only thing the deputy proposed. They also suggested new rules for holiday transfers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The deputy also proposed introducing new rules for public holidays in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh? Like, how they move them around if they fall on a weekend?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh? Like, how they move them around if they fall on a weekend?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, precisely. Seitzhan thought they should approve the transfer schedule *two years* in advance. So, like, by the end of this year, you'd know all the transfers up to, say, 2027.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, precisely. Seitzhan thought they should approve the transfer schedule two years in advance. So, like, by the end of this year, you'd know all the transfers up to, say, twenty twenty seven.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In particular, Seitzhan believes it is necessary to approve the schedule for transferring holidays two years in advance. For example, this year it would be possible to approve holiday transfers up to the end of 2027.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, I can see why. Businesses could plan better, people could book vacations, [overlaps] right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, I can see why. Businesses could plan better, people could book vacations, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Totally! That was the whole point, for long-term planning. But, uh, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection responded to that specific bit...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! That was the whole point, for long-term planning. But, uh, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection responded to that specific bit...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the deputy, this would allow businesses to make long-term plans and Kazakhstanis to plan vacations and family events in advance. The Ministry of Labor and Social Protection of the Population responded to the deputy™s inquiry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And? Did they go for it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And? Did they go for it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Not so much, actually. They didn't support the two-year advance approval. They said that transferring holidays needs to be flexible, considering things like, uh, the economic situation, political events, even sanitary conditions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not so much, actually. They didn't support the two-year advance approval. They said that transferring holidays needs to be flexible, considering things like, uh, the economic situation, political events, even sanitary conditions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They did not support the idea of approving the holiday transfer schedule two years in advance. "The transfer of holidays is carried out in advance for the upcoming calendar year, taking into account the overlap of working and public holidays, as well as depending on the economic, political, or sanitary-epidemiological situation in the country, which is determined individually for each period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Oh, so they wanna keep it a bit more fluid, then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so they wanna keep it a bit more fluid, then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They called the current one-year-in-advance procedure "optimal." But, good news for the kids, Host_B...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They called the current one-year-in-advance procedure optimal. But, good news for the kids, Host B...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Based on this, we consider the current procedure for transferring holidays to other working days to be optimal," the response said, signed by Minister of Labor and Social Protection Svetlana Zhakupova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, they *did* approve the Children's Day part?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they did approve the Children's Day part?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They absolutely did! The Ministry totally backed establishing June 1st as a national holiday. They said it gives families a chance to spend time together, do cultural things, and, you know, just create a safe, positive environment for kids.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They absolutely did! The Ministry totally backed establishing June first as a national holiday. They said it gives families a chance to spend time together, do cultural things, and, you know, just create a safe, positive environment for kids.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, the ministry supported the proposal to designate June 1 as a national holiday. "This holiday gives parents and children the opportunity to spend time together and take part in cultural, educational, and social activities. It helps create a favorable psycho-emotional environment for the child and a sense of complete safety with the family. Based on the above, and considering the goal of strengthening the institution of the family and family values in our country, we believe it is possible to establish June 1 as a national holiday " Children™s Day," the ministry stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. So, one out of two, but a pretty sweet one for families, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. So, one out of two, but a pretty sweet one for families, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. A new national day off might just be on the horizon for Kazakhstan!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. A new national day off might just be on the horizon for Kazakhstan!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A new national holiday and day off may be introduced in Kazakhstan.
